message:
I have a three-part article series and a helper library for using async with MVVM:  
[https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn605875.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn605875.aspx)  
[https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn630647.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn630647.aspx)  
[https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn683795.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn683795.aspx)  
[https://github.com/StephenCleary/Mvvm.Async](https://github.com/StephenCleary/Mvvm.Async)
